name.baseName: Veterinary chemical raw materials ; Corn, starch, glucose, etc. ; Fermentation ; less than 200 t/a; NESPS2
兽用化学药品原料药 ; 玉米、淀粉、葡萄糖等 ; 发酵 ; 小于200吨/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 这些年产不超过200吨的兽用化学药品原料如玉米、淀粉、葡萄糖，通过发酵过程获得，专门用于制造兽药。这些物质用于生产旨在促进动物健康的药物。尾端处理技术用于处理制药设施废水和排放气体中的各种污染物，如化学需氧量(COD)、氨氮、总磷、有机结合氮和挥发性有机化合物(VOCs)。这些技术包括物理化学、好氧生物、厌氧生物处理和高级氧化过程的组合，根据待处理的污染物显示出不同的效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,三级代码275.0文件，在完整版文件中第3116页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative catalytic combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是蓄热式催化燃烧法，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间(小时)/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物，产污系数备注为发酵工艺中采用树脂提取工艺

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic/aerobic biological combined treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.1，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is K = normal operation time of wastewater treatment facility (hours/year) / normal production time of enterprises (hours/year)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法+厌/好氧生物组合处理+物理化学处理法，其效率为99.1，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间(天)/正常生产时间（天）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷，产污系数备注为发酵工艺中采用非树脂提取工艺，

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.8，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = opreating time of treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸附+蒸气解析，其效率为98.8，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间(小时)/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物，产污系数备注为发酵工艺中采用树脂提取工艺
